target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Manage Communities tab, click Add to display the Add Community form.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Manage Communities tab, click Add to display the Add Community form.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Community Name field, type a community name.

target.name: Step
target.text: (Optional) In the Account Number field, type an account number.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Contact Name field, type the name of the individual who is the primary contact for this community.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Contact Email field, type the e-mail address of the primary contact.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Contact Phone field, type the phone number for the primary contact.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the User Name field, type the name of the community administrator for the community (the user who creates the other users in the community via the Conferencing Client console). Enter the full name of the community administrator (for example, Bob Smith).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the User Password field, type a password for the community administrator.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the User Screenname field, type a screen name for the community administrator.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the User is Admin option to indicate that the user is a community administrator. Do not select this option if the first user in this community should not have administrative access.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the phone number of the voice bridge for this community from the Bridge Phone drop-down list.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the System URL field, type the assigned system URL for community meeting invitations.

target.name: Step
target.text: After you have entered the new community data, click Add to create the community.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: To Find a Community by Name
